Boolean.Name: Suppress Startup Banner
Boolean.Description: Suppress the display of the startup banner and information messages.

String.Name: Output File
String.Description: Overrides the default output file name.

Boolean.Name: Preserve SBR Files
Boolean.Description: Causes bscmake.exe to do full builds that preserve the .sbr file. This is to enable use of alternative incremental build methods. (/n)
